text: is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Sasaki was born on January 30, 1936. After graduating from Kansai University, he joined Dunlop Japan in 1958. On December 25, 1958, he debuted for the Japan national team against Hong Kong. He played 14 games and scored 1 goal for Japan until 1961. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1958||2||0 |- |1959||8||0 |- |1960||1||3 |- |1961||3||0 |- !Total||14||1 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan international footballers
title: Koji Sasaki
